survey_name: Employee Feedback on Remote Work Technology Tools
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness, usability, and satisfaction with technology tools used for remote work. The insights will help improve the toolset and training provided to remote employees.

questions.question_text: Which of the following technology tools do you regularly use for remote work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: List should cover common remote work tools. Include 'Other' option to capture unlisted tools. Mobile-friendly dropdown recommended for long lists.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkbox input type for multi-select options.

questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale recommended for balanced responses. Ensure scale is clearly labeled.
